Game.Name: World Tennis Stars (Europe)
Game.plot: World Tennis Stars is a Tennis game, developed by Awesome Developments and published by Ignition Entertainment, which was released in 2004.http://www.gamefaqs.com/portable/gbadvance/home/583068.html
Game.Notes: Join the fun in this cute and colourful tennis game. Choose from 6 quirky characters and take on all new comers, in an attempt to become the number one WORLD TENNIS STARS. With 6 exciting courts and two play modes, WORLD TENNIS STARS will serve up hours of fun.
